description: Discharge of Planning Conditions 7 (Construction Logistics Plan), Condition 8 (Facing Materials), Condition 9 (Detailed Drawings), Condition 12 (Refuse and Recycling facilities), Condition 14 (Evidence of CO2 reductions and internal water usage), Condition 15 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy) and Condition 16 (Hard and Soft Landscaping Plan) of Planning Permission ref:18/00194/FUL (Demolition of an existing single storey garage and the erection of a two storey, 3 bedroom dwelling with associated amenity space and off street car parking) dated 10/05/2019
